title: Atmospheric inversions trap forest fire smoke

content.question: Smoke from forest fires is most likely to affect air quality over larger areas for many days when

choices.label: smog is produced due to chemical reactions in the atmosphere
a persistent atmospheric inversion exists in the region
oak trees are burned, releasing terpenes into the atmosphere
primary, rather than secondary, forests are burned
vegetation in the region is green and burns more slowly

content.answer: a persistent atmospheric inversion exists in the region

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
